sentences.en: Agents will raise the issue of prize-money for next year's world championships.
sentences.cn: 经纪人将提出下年度世锦赛奖金的问题。

sentences.en: Alison and I had to prize conversation out of him.
sentences.cn: 我和艾莉森只得从他口中撬出谈话内容。

sentences.en: An Olympic gold medal is the most sought-after prize in world sport.
sentences.cn: 在世界体坛上，一枚奥运会金牌是最令人向往的奖项。

sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每场表演期间，我们将以抽彩方法送出大奖。

sentences.en: e is someone who prizes truth and decency above all things.
sentences.cn: 他把真理和正派看得高于一切。

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentences.cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

sentences.en: He had been on the Nobel Prize committee's list of possibles.
sentences.cn: 他在诺贝尔委员会列出的获奖候选者名单之列.

sentences.en: He has spent months cultivating what he hopes are prize flowers.
sentences.cn: 他花了几个月培育他认为有望获奖的花卉品种。

sentences.en: He is someone who prizes truth and decency above all things.
sentences.cn: 他把真理和正派看得高于一切。

sentences.en: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1985.
sentences.cn: 他于1985年被授予诺贝尔物理学奖。

sentences.en: He was shortlisted for the Nobel Prize for literature several times.
sentences.cn: 他已经数次获诺贝尔文学奖提名。

sentences.en: He won first prize at the Leeds Piano Competition.
sentences.cn: 他在利兹国际钢琴比赛中荣获一等奖。

sentences.en: Imagine winning the local lottery first prize of £5,000.
sentences.cn: 想象一下中个5,000英镑的当地彩票头奖吧。

sentences.en: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.cn: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.en: It was a real prize due to its rarity and good condition.
sentences.cn: 因为稀有并且品相完好，它价值连城。

sentences.en: The delighted pensioner walked off with a £2,000 prize.
sentences.cn: 那个退休老人轻松赢得了2,000英镑的奖金，高兴得不得了。

sentences.en: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.cn: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.en: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.cn: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.en: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.cn: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

sentences.en: there's no prizes for guessing what you two have been up to!.
sentences.cn: 你们俩在干什么一猜就中。

sentences.en: This book prize is the biggest of its kind in the world.
sentences.cn: 这一图书奖项是世界上同类奖项中分量最重的。

sentences.en: You must claim your prize by telephoning our claims line.
sentences.cn: 您必须通过拨打我们的领奖电话来领取奖品。

words.tran_cn: 有得奖可能的；已获奖的

phrases.tran_cn: （旧时出售捕获船货物后分给立功官兵的）捕获物奖金
赢得头奖；获一等奖；得第一名

trans.tran_en: good enough to win a prize or having won a prize
something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable

trans.tran_cn: 珍惜， 珍藏； 给…很高的评价
trans.tran_en: to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
